operations.name: Fetch Topologies of current user

queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Format - int32. Max number of topologies returned (sorted by updatedAt DESC). All topologies are returned if not specified.

queryParameters.description: Used to filter returned properties from the model (example: id,status,devices{id,localId},panels)
